
一个典型的注册命令
register-{"Id":"ssbc2","Relayers":[{"Id":"QmXVPeS7f4yYmNKjmwNsy8u4WNL4fVsxUARPFBsWScr3uG","PublicKey":"{\"N\":,\"E\":65537}","IP":"127.0.0.1","Port":"50421"}],"Servers":[{"Id":"QmXVPeS7f4yYmNKjmwNsy8u4WNL4fVsxUARPFBsWScr3uG","PublicKey":"{\"N\":,\"E\":65537}","IP":"127.0.0.1","Port":"50421"}]}


//提交一笔交易的格式：
tx-{"from":"A","to":"B","data":"hello","value":10}


//提交一笔跨链交易的格式：
cto-{"SourceChainId":"ssbc","DestChainId":"ssbc2","Type":"CTT","From":"QmQeDk5u1Pw7jYJMTsKFTT9i53uw1cY3YpA1NSj93DoWyQ","To":"QmZxarfNST2jYnrqXGci2VQq4LK12ARaE4r6emZSdUCAkX","Value":10}
